subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Lightning, led by its superlative center, Vincent Lecavalier, has put three pucks past Devils goaltender Martin Brodeur in each game of this series, taking a 2-1 lead.
snippet: The Lightning, led by its superlative center, Vincent Lecavalier, has put three pucks past Devils goaltender Martin Brodeur in each game of this series, taking a 2-1 lead.
